snippet: This show at Bridget Donahue is part archive, part reliquary and part toolbox.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibit if God COMes to visit You, HOW will you know? (the great tetrahedral kite), collection of storytelling kits created by artist-couturier Susan Cianciolo at Bridget Donahue.
lead_paragraph: This show at Bridget Donahue is part archive, part reliquary and part toolbox.

headline.main: Review: Susan Cianciolo Lets Others Pick Through Fragments of Her Life
